    Class and Description

    com.psddev.cms.db.PageFilter.getPage(HttpServletRequest)
    Use PageFilter.Static.getPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest) instead. To maintain backward compatibility, this method will return a null instead of looking for the most appropriate page to render with, if it's called before PageFilter.doRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain).
